verses.verse: And the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH3947> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of God, <WH430> and brought <WH935> it from Ebenezer <WH4480> <WH72> unto Ashdod. <WH795>
When the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH3947> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of God, <WH430> they brought <WH935> it into the house <WH1004> of Dagon, <WH1712> and set <WH3322> it by <WH681> Dagon. <WH1712>

And when they of Ashdod <WH795> arose early <WH7925> on the morrow, <WH4480> <WH4283> behold, <WH2009> Dagon <WH1712> was fallen <WH5307> upon his face <WH6440> to the earth <WH776> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD. <WH3068> And they took <WH3947> <WH853> Dagon, <WH1712> and set <WH7725> him in his place <WH4725> again.

And when they arose early <WH7925> on the morrow <WH4480> <WH4283> morning, <WH1242> behold, <WH2009> Dagon <WH1712> was fallen <WH5307> upon his face <WH6440> to the ground <WH776> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD; <WH3068> and the head <WH7218> of Dagon <WH1712> and both <WH8147> the palms <WH3709> of his hands <WH3027> were cut off <WH3772> upon <WH413> the threshold; <WH4670> only <WH7535> the stump of Dagon <WH1712> was left <WH7604> to <WH5921> him.

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> neither <WH3808> the priests <WH3548> of Dagon, <WH1712> nor any <WH3605> that come <WH935> into Dagon's <WH1712> house, <WH1004> tread <WH1869> on <WH5921> the threshold <WH4670> of Dagon <WH1712> in Ashdod <WH795> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

But the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was heavy <WH3513> upon <WH413> them of Ashdod, <WH795> and he destroyed <WH8074> them, and smote <WH5221> them with emerods, <WH6076> even <WH853> Ashdod <WH795> and the coasts <WH1366> thereof.

And when the men <WH376> of Ashdod <WH795> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> it was so, <WH3651> they said, <WH559> The ark <WH727> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> shall not <WH3808> abide <WH3427> with <WH5973> us: for <WH3588> his hand <WH3027> is sore <WH7185> upon <WH5921> us, and upon <WH5921> Dagon <WH1712> our god. <WH430>

They sent <WH7971> therefore and gathered <WH622> <WH853> all <WH3605> the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> unto <WH413> them, and said, <WH559> What <WH4100> shall we do <WH6213> with the ark <WH727> of the God <WH430> of Israel? <WH3478> And they answered, <WH559> Let the ark <WH727> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> be carried about <WH5437> unto Gath. <WH1661> And they carried <WH5437> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> about thither.

And it was <WH1961> so, that, after <WH310> they had carried it about, <WH5437> <WH853> the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was <WH1961> against the city <WH5892> with a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> destruction: <WH4103> and he smote <WH5221> <WH853> the men <WH376> of the city, <WH5892> both small <WH4480> <WH6996> and great, <WH1419> and they had emerods <WH6076> in their secret parts. <WH8368>

Therefore they sent <WH7971> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of God <WH430> to Ekron. <WH6138> And it came to pass, <WH1961> as the ark <WH727> of God <WH430> came <WH935> to Ekron, <WH6138> that the Ekronites <WH6139> cried out, <WH2199> saying, <WH559> They have brought about <WH5437> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> to <WH413> us, to slay <WH4191> us and our people. <WH5971>

So they sent <WH7971> and gathered together <WH622> <WH853> all <WH3605> the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and said, <WH559> Send away <WH7971> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> and let it go again <WH7725> to his own place, <WH4725> that it slay <WH4191> us not, <WH3808> and our people: <WH5971> for <WH3588> there was <WH1961> a deadly <WH4194> destruction <WH4103> throughout all <WH3605> the city; <WH5892> the hand <WH3027> of God <WH430> was very <WH3966> heavy <WH3513> there. <WH8033>
And the men <WH376> that <WH834> died <WH4191> not <WH3808> were smitten <WH5221> with the emerods: <WH6076> and the cry <WH7775> of the city <WH5892> went up <WH5927> to heaven. <WH8064>
